words.def: a person with special knowledge or ability who performs skillfully
put to use
disciple of Jesus and leader of the Apostles
president, especially of a university.
characterized by a lightly pert and exuberant quality
Alternative spelling of père.
a person who is of equal standing with another in a group
a network of intersecting blood vessels or intersecting nerves or intersecting lymph vessels
a tall perennial woody plant having a main trunk and branches forming a distinct elevated crown
a male sovereign
informal abbreviation of `representative'
a domesticated animal kept for companionship or amusement
liquid excretory product
place (flax, hemp, or jute) in liquid so as to promote loosening of the fibers from the woody tissue
A state of befuddlement; intoxication.
the starting place for each hole on a golf course
a man who was formerly a certain woman's husband
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
